parameters.name: StyleName
parameters.description: Name of the style to add or update

parameters.name: BreakLinks
parameters.description: True to break all links to this style, false to not

title: IAnnotation.AddOrUpdateStyle
description: Adds or updates the annotation linked to the specified style.
signature:
System.Boolean AddOrUpdateStyle( 
   System.String
StyleName
,
   System.Boolean
BreakLinks
)

parameters.name: StyleName
parameters.description: Name of the style to add or update

parameters.name: BreakLinks
parameters.description: True to break all links to this style, false to not

returns: Ture if the operation succeeds, false if it fails
